title: Whole team feeds on first placement match.
body: Was quite possibly the most challenging match I have ever played simply due to the extent everyone fed which included mid bot and jungle. Besides that they were a reasonably good team and grouped, tried to win and most importantly of all they listened to everything I said as if it was gospel. The only reason I ever get toxic is when people get caught or don't listen to my great insight on league of legends. Besides their feeding they were actually a very good easy team to work with considering. But please Riot fix matchmaking so I don't have to endure this every game.

replies.body: You obviously carried but I don't think your team fed.. Seems like a pretty boastful post to me but these situations unfortunately are going to happen in the first few games of placements as the system sorts itself out.

"my team feeds" - most deaths on team is 5 LMAO

That Jax is a feeder, no one else.

Mate you did not see lane phase.
If I wasn't able to pretty much 1v3 that game was lost.

> [{quoted}](name=skillzorddragonb,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=9zgRNhfm,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-01-21T05:29:03.453+0000)
>
> Mate you did not see lane phase.
> If I wasn't able to pretty much 1v3 that game was lost.

Still doesn't mean they fed? And Alistar was not close, in any way whatsoever, to feeding. He died twice and picked up a fair amount of assists.
7 kill lucian out of lane phase, he got not kills after we grouped and I 1 shot him.

You're a Silver 2 who smashed a Bronze 1 in lane.

Congrats, you're happy you stomped some people. But you're team didn't feed.

That Jax is 0-10-3 and built a Tiamat... you were always gonna beat him.

My main and the account im posting was pretty much plat actually.  The second I saw he got q level 1 I knew he was bad and rekd his face with my creative but sexually provocative moves of great beauty. I made the account for riven only and have gotten very good at her mechanics by learning how to do all her niche tricks and stuff as well as learning all the matchups.

> [{quoted}](name=BarryButcher,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=9zgRNhfm,comment-id=000100000002,timestamp=2015-01-21T05:38:48.727+0000)

omg I just looked at the builds now... He got the Tiamat before finishing his Tri first. Also, Morgana no Sightstone :P
I would link you the replay but lolreplay wasn't recording it for some reason and no replay on op.gg.

Welp, when your done can you do me a solid:

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/NW2dE2AR-season-2015

"whole team feeds"
yeah but that 0/10 jax is perfectly fine, no problems there.
Yeh  he was bronze or something idk, he said to me he was silver but based on him getting q at lvl 1 and sucking I assumed he was bronze.
